description: This is a React context file defining an AuthContext and AuthProvider component to manage authentication state, handle login, registration, and logout functionalities, and fetch current user info on mount.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React functional component providing authentication context and handling user login, registration, and logout.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Asynchronous function to authenticate user with email and password, store token, and set user state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Asynchronous function to register a new user and then log them in.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Function to clear user and token state, effectively logging out the user.
